channel.title: Comments on: And the rich get richer..

item.title: By: Novinky ze světa otevřených zdrojů | Otevřené vzdělávání
item.dc:creator: Novinky ze světa otevřených zdrojů | Otevřené vzdělávání
item.description: […] autorům publikovat zlatou cestou OA. Paleontolog a propagátor OA Jon Tennant však dohodu zkritizoval, protože Gatesovy peníze podle něj umožní jen velmi málo článkům, aby tak byly […]
item.content:encoded: […] autorům publikovat zlatou cestou OA. Paleontolog a propagátor OA Jon Tennant však dohodu zkritizoval, protože Gatesovy peníze podle něj umožní jen velmi málo článkům, aby tak byly […]

item.title: By: Björn Brembs
item.dc:creator: Björn Brembs
item.description:
One could also see it as AAAS throwing the gauntlet at Nature, as Nature is on the record as saying they'd need to charge around US$50k (roughly in today's dollars) to keep their revenue constant in an OA world:
https://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm200304/cmselect/cmsctech/399/399we163.htm
So if AAAS can make ends meet with a measly 10k, that's dirt cheap.
item.content:encoded:
One could also see it as AAAS throwing the gauntlet at Nature, as Nature is on the record as saying they’d need to charge around US$50k (roughly in today’s dollars) to keep their revenue constant in an OA world:

https://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm200304/cmselect/cmsctech/399/399we163.htm

So if AAAS can make ends meet with a measly 10k, that’s dirt cheap.
